javadoc: Command class to add an offset memory reference to the program.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Command constructor for adding an offset memory reference

params.name: fromAddr
params.comment: address of the codeunit where the reference occurs

params.name: toAddr
params.comment: address of the location being referenced.

params.name: refType
params.comment: reference type - how the location is being referenced.

params.name: opIndex
params.comment: the operand index in the code unit where the reference occurs

params.name: offset
params.comment: value added to a base address to get the toAddr

name: AddOffsetMemRefCmd
comment: Command class to add an offset memory reference to the program.
